025
026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html;
027
028import javax.lang.model.SourceVersion;
029import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationValue;
030import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
031import javax.lang.model.element.ExecutableElement;
032import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
033import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
034
035import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.Comment;
036import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.ContentBuilder;
037import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlStyle;
038import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlTree;
039import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.Text;
040import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.AnnotationTypeMemberWriter;
041import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
042import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.MemberSummaryWriter;
043
044/**
045 * Writes annotation interface member documentation in HTML format.
046 */
047public class AnnotationTypeMemberWriterImpl extends AbstractMemberWriter
048        implements AnnotationTypeMemberWriter, MemberSummaryWriter {
049
050    /**
051     * We generate separate summaries for required and optional annotation interface members,
052     * so we need dedicated writer instances for each kind. For the details section, a single
053     * shared list is generated so a special {@code ANY} value is provided for this case.
054     */
055    enum Kind {
056        OPTIONAL,
057        REQUIRED,
058        ANY
059    }
060
061    private final Kind kind;
062
063    /**
064     * Constructs a new AnnotationTypeMemberWriterImpl for any kind of member.
065     *
066     * @param writer The writer for the class that the member belongs to.
067     */
068    public AnnotationTypeMemberWriterImpl(SubWriterHolderWriter writer) {
069        super(writer);
070        this.kind = Kind.ANY;
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Constructs a new AnnotationTypeMemberWriterImpl for a specific kind of member.
075     *
076     * @param writer         the writer that will write the output.
077     * @param annotationType the AnnotationType that holds this member.
078     * @param kind           the kind of annotation interface members to handle.
079     */
080    public AnnotationTypeMemberWriterImpl(SubWriterHolderWriter writer,
081            TypeElement annotationType,
082            Kind kind) {
083        super(writer, annotationType);
084        this.kind = kind;
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    public Content getMemberSummaryHeader(TypeElement typeElement,
089            Content content) {
090        switch (kind) {
091        case OPTIONAL -> content.add(selectComment(
092            MarkerComments.START_OF_ANNOTATION_TYPE_OPTIONAL_MEMBER_SUMMARY,
093            MarkerComments.START_OF_ANNOTATION_INTERFACE_OPTIONAL_MEMBER_SUMMARY));
094        case REQUIRED -> content.add(selectComment(
095            MarkerComments.START_OF_ANNOTATION_TYPE_REQUIRED_MEMBER_SUMMARY,
096            MarkerComments.START_OF_ANNOTATION_INTERFACE_REQUIRED_MEMBER_SUMMARY));
097        case ANY -> throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
098            "unsupported member kind");
099        }
100        Content c = new ContentBuilder();
101        writer.addSummaryHeader(this, c);
102        return c;
103    }
104
105    @Override
106    public Content getMemberHeader() {
107        return writer.getMemberHeader();
108    }
109
110    @Override
111    public void addSummary(Content summariesList, Content content) {
112        writer.addSummary(HtmlStyle.memberSummary,
113            switch (kind) {
114            case REQUIRED -> HtmlIds.ANNOTATION_TYPE_REQUIRED_ELEMENT_SUMMARY;
115            case OPTIONAL -> HtmlIds.ANNOTATION_TYPE_OPTIONAL_ELEMENT_SUMMARY;
116            case ANY -> throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
117                "unsupported member kind");
118            },
119            summariesList, content);
120    }
121
122    @Override
123    public void addAnnotationDetailsMarker(Content memberDetails) {
124        memberDetails.add(selectComment(
125            MarkerComments.START_OF_ANNOTATION_TYPE_DETAILS,
126            MarkerComments.START_OF_ANNOTATION_INTERFACE_DETAILS));
127    }
128
129    @Override
130    public Content getAnnotationDetailsHeader() {
131        Content memberDetails = new ContentBuilder();
132        var heading = HtmlTree.HEADING(Headings.TypeDeclaration.DETAILS_HEADING,
133            contents.annotationTypeDetailsLabel);
134        memberDetails.add(heading);
135        return memberDetails;
136    }
137
138    @Override
139    public Content getAnnotationHeaderContent(Element member) {
140        Content content = new ContentBuilder();
141        var heading = HtmlTree.HEADING(Headings.TypeDeclaration.MEMBER_HEADING,
142            Text.of(name(member)));
143        content.add(heading);
144        return HtmlTree.SECTION(HtmlStyle.detail, content)
145            .setId(htmlIds.forMember(typeElement, (ExecutableElement) member));
146    }
147
148    @Override
149    public Content getSignature(Element member) {
150        return new Signatures.MemberSignature(member, this)
151            .setType(getType(member))
152            .setAnnotations(writer.getAnnotationInfo(member, true))
153            .toContent();
154    }
155
156    @Override
157    public void addDeprecated(Element member, Content target) {
158        addDeprecatedInfo(member, target);
159    }
160
161    @Override
162    public void addPreview(Element member, Content content) {
163        addPreviewInfo(member, content);
164    }
165
166    @Override
167    public void addComments(Element member, Content annotationContent) {
168        addComment(member, annotationContent);
169    }
170
171    @Override
172    public void addTags(Element member, Content annotationContent) {
173        writer.addTagsInfo(member, annotationContent);
174    }
175
176    @Override
177    public Content getAnnotationDetails(Content annotationDetailsHeader,
178            Content annotationDetails) {
179        Content c
180            = new ContentBuilder(annotationDetailsHeader, annotationDetails);
181        return getMember(HtmlTree.SECTION(HtmlStyle.memberDetails, c));
182    }
183
184    @Override
185    public void addSummaryLabel(Content content) {
186        var label = HtmlTree.HEADING(Headings.TypeDeclaration.SUMMARY_HEADING,
187            switch (kind) {
188            case REQUIRED -> contents.annotateTypeRequiredMemberSummaryLabel;
189            case OPTIONAL -> contents.annotateTypeOptionalMemberSummaryLabel;
190            case ANY -> throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
191                "unsupported member kind");
192            });
193        content.add(label);
194    }
195
196    /**
197     * Get the caption for the summary table.
198     * @return the caption
199     */
200    protected Content getCaption() {
201        return contents.getContent(
202            switch (kind) {
203            case REQUIRED -> "doclet.Annotation_Type_Required_Members";
204            case OPTIONAL -> "doclet.Annotation_Type_Optional_Members";
205            case ANY -> throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
206                "unsupported member kind");
207            });
208    }
209
210    @Override
211    public TableHeader getSummaryTableHeader(Element member) {
212        return new TableHeader(contents.modifierAndTypeLabel,
213            switch (kind) {
214            case REQUIRED -> contents.annotationTypeRequiredMemberLabel;
215            case OPTIONAL -> contents.annotationTypeOptionalMemberLabel;
216            case ANY -> throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
217                "unsupported member kind");
218            },
219            contents.descriptionLabel);
220    }
221
222    @Override
223    protected Table<Element> createSummaryTable() {
224        return new Table<Element>(HtmlStyle.summaryTable)
225            .setCaption(getCaption())
226            .setHeader(getSummaryTableHeader(typeElement))
227            .setColumnStyles(HtmlStyle.colFirst, HtmlStyle.colSecond,
228                HtmlStyle.colLast);
229    }
230
231    @Override
232    public void addInheritedSummaryLabel(TypeElement typeElement,
233            Content content) {
234    }
235
236    @Override
237    protected void addSummaryLink(HtmlLinkInfo.Kind context,
238            TypeElement typeElement, Element member,
239            Content content) {
240        Content memberLink = writer.getDocLink(context,
241            utils.getEnclosingTypeElement(member), member,
242            name(member), HtmlStyle.memberNameLink);
243        var code = HtmlTree.CODE(memberLink);
244        content.add(code);
245    }
246
247    @Override
248    protected void addInheritedSummaryLink(TypeElement typeElement,
249            Element member, Content target) {
250        // Not applicable.
251    }
252
253    @Override
254    protected void addSummaryType(Element member, Content content) {
255        addModifiersAndType(member, getType(member), content);
256    }
257
258    @Override
259    protected Content getSummaryLink(Element member) {
260        String name = utils.getFullyQualifiedName(member) + "."
261            + member.getSimpleName();
262        return writer.getDocLink(HtmlLinkInfo.Kind.SHOW_PREVIEW, member, name);
263    }
264
265    protected Comment selectComment(Comment c1, Comment c2) {
266        HtmlConfiguration configuration = writer.configuration;
267        SourceVersion sv = configuration.docEnv.getSourceVersion();
268        return sv.compareTo(SourceVersion.RELEASE_16) < 0 ? c1 : c2;
269    }
270
271    private TypeMirror getType(Element member) {
272        return utils.isExecutableElement(member)
273            ? utils.getReturnType(typeElement, (ExecutableElement) member)
274            : member.asType();
275    }
276
277    public void addDefaultValueInfo(Element member, Content annotationContent) {
278        if (utils.isAnnotationInterface(member.getEnclosingElement())) {
279            ExecutableElement ee = (ExecutableElement) member;
280            AnnotationValue value = ee.getDefaultValue();
281            if (value != null) {
282                var dl = HtmlTree.DL(HtmlStyle.notes);
283                dl.add(HtmlTree.DT(contents.default_));
284                dl.add(HtmlTree.DD(HtmlTree.CODE(Text.of(value.toString()))));
285                annotationContent.add(dl);
286            }
287        }
288    }
289}
